CustomField.description: Checkbox to trigger an email when the project billings total is over a threshold percentage of its bookings total. There must be a contact in the Alert Recipient field and there must also be a value in the Alert Threshold field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select to enable email alerts when project billings and pre-billed total equals or exceeds a percentage of its bookings total, represented by the Alert Threshold. You must select a contact from the Alert Recipient field and enter Alert Threshold value
CustomField.label: Apply Billing Cap
